name: Gladius
description: The veterans mutter a mantra as they polish their weapons. "The warrior must be strong and true, like the broadsword."

name: Broadword
description: This is a thick, steadfast blade. Finesse will not survive a savage battlefieldâ€”brutal practicality will.

name: Maple Staff
description: The leaves of the maple tree change colors with the season. Mages who appreciate such natural harmony favor this staff.

name: Spatha
description: Protecting your body with mere shells and scales does not ensure victory. Swords are to warriors as fangs are to lions

name: Shortbow
description: This bow is shorter and easier to carry than the standard longbow. It requires little strength to draw for easier use.

name: Iron Rod
description: Though it is primarily used to conduct magic, this iron rod doubles as a club in a pinch, which makes it quite popular.

name: Taiaha
description: A caster of spells dug up the tree roots, and with them struck the glowing shells, sending pure tones reverberating.

name: Longbow
description: Made from high-quality wood. It requires considerable strength to operate, but has enough power to easily pierce armor.
